prompts.prompt: Describe a news report recently heard or read.
questions: how you felt about this news

prompts.prompt: Describe a sport you would like to learn to play well.
questions: why you would like to learn

prompts.prompt: Describe a useful website.
questions: what kind of site it is
what kind of information it offers
why you think it is useful

prompts.prompt: Describe a journey that didn’t go as planned.
Describe a song you like.
questions: what kind of song it is

prompts.prompt: Describe a photograph you like.
questions: what can be seen in the photo

prompts.prompt: Talk about a piece of advice you recently received.
questions: how you feel about the advice

prompts.prompt: Describe an animal you like.
questions: how it is useful or important

prompts.prompt: Describe something you bought recently that you like.
Describe an unusual meal you have had.
questions: why it was unusual for you

prompts.prompt: Talk about a historical event.
questions: why it is important to remember

prompts.prompt: Talk about a difficult decision.
questions: when you had to make a choice
why you had to make it

prompts.prompt: Describe a TV show.
questions: what type of show it is

prompts.prompt: Talk about a facility you would like to have in your city or town.
questions: what type of facility you would like

prompts.prompt: Describe a person who makes you laugh.
questions: how he / she makes you laugh
why humor is useful in your life

prompts.prompt: Describe a childhood toy.
questions: what type of toy it was

prompts.prompt: Talk about a time you had to be polite.
Describe a recent development in the place where you live.
questions: how it may impact the area
how you feel about the change

prompts.prompt: Describe your favorite room.
questions: why it is your favorite room

prompts.prompt: Describe a museum you enjoyed visiting.
Describe a place where you read.
questions: why it is a good place to read

prompts.prompt: Talk about a time you had to use your imagination.
questions: why you had to use your imagination
how easy or difficult it was

prompts.prompt: Describe a person you know who you think dresses well.
questions: how long you have known them
what clothes they like to wear
why you think they dress well

prompts.prompt: Describe a major street in a city where you have lived.
questions: what places are located on the street
why you think the street is so important

prompts.prompt: Talk about a time you experienced extreme weather.
questions: how you dealt with the weather

prompts.prompt: Talk about a person you know whose job is important to society.
Describe a garden or park you have visited.
questions: why it is memorable to you

prompts.prompt: Talk about a person you know who collects things.
Talk about a film you did not enjoy.
questions: why you did not enjoy it

prompts.prompt: Describe a shop you often go to.
questions: why you choose to buy from that shop

prompts.prompt: Talk about a musical event you attended.
questions: what kind of music was played

prompts.prompt: Talk about a person you know who can speak two or more languages.
questions: how long you have known them

prompts.prompt: Describe a team you have been a member of.
questions: what your role in the team was
how you felt about your experience

prompts.prompt: Talk about a time you forgot something.
Talk about a time you taught someone something.
Talk about an activity you like that you can do for free (without paying money).
Talk about a school rule you didn’t like.
Describe a chore or errand that technology has made obsolete.
questions: how you feel about the change

prompts.prompt: Describe a person who accidentally became your friend.
Describe a method to save money.
questions: how it compares to other methods

prompts.prompt: Describe a child that you know.
Talk about an accident you saw.
